src:
3 Pelaku Hipnotis Modus Jual Taring Babi Palsu Diciduk di Kalteng
07 Nov 2019, 10:48 by Tim detikcom
Kotawaringin Timur - Polisi menangkap 3 pelaku hipnotis modus jual taring babi di Kotawaringin Timur, Kalteng. Ketiga pelaku yaitu SAB, BH dan AR berhasil menipu korbannya Rp 20 juta.
"Begitu mendapat laporan, kami langsung menyelidikinya. Alhamdulillah ketiga pelaku berhasil ditangkap di sebuah hotel di Sampit tempat mereka menginap," kata Kapolres Kotawaringin Timur (Kotim) AKBP Mohammad Rommel di Sampit, yang dikutip dari Antara, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Penipuan dengan modus gendam itu terjadi Senin (4/11) sekitar pukul 17.00 WIB di depan sebuah toko sembako di kawasan Pusat Perbelanjaan Mentaya Sampit.
Rommel mengatakan, saat itu korban warga Kecamatan Telaga Antang sedang duduk menunggu barang belanjaannya di sebuah toko sembako. Tiba-tiba seorang pelaku datang menghampiri mengajak berbincang dan meminta korban mencium sebuah gelang yang dibawa pelaku.
text:
3 Mode Hypnosis Sellers Sell Fake Pig Fangs Arrested in Central Kalimantan
Nov 7 2019, 10:48 by Tim detikcom
East Kotawaringin - Police arrested 3 hypnosis perpetrators selling pig fangs in Kotawaringin Timur, Central Kalimantan. The three perpetrators namely SAB, BH and AR managed to deceive the victims to Rp 20 million.
"As soon as we got the report, we immediately investigated it. Alhamdulillah the three perpetrators were arrested at a hotel in Sampit where they were staying," said Chief of East Kotawaringin Police (Kotim) AKBP Mohammad Rommel in Sampit, quoted from Antara on Thursday (11/07/2019) .
The fraud with the gendam mode occurred on Monday (11/4) around 17.00 WIB in front of a grocery store in the Mentaya Sampit Shopping Center area.
Rommel said that at that time the residents of Telaga Antang District were sitting waiting for their groceries at a grocery store. Suddenly a perpetrator came over to talk and asked the victim to kiss a bracelet the perpetrator brought.
